name: Mega Rescue Corp
description:
The Mega Rescue Corp was founded in the year 2149. Their aim was to make sure no one who needs rescuing feels alone. How could they when they know a thousand pound rescue bot is on the way!

Play as Notal-1 and work your way through environment puzzles to save the day.

Controls

Move - W,A,S,D & Space
Grapple - Left Click
Reel In/Out - E/Q
